backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, friend management, game result recording, and leaderboard functionality with persistent storage using Maps and Lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for authentication, pages, and all four mini-games.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files describing routing, hooks, components, pages, and game implementations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including gaming-themed color tokens and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script import for the React application titled 'Arcade Arena'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for all pages and games, wrapped in ThemeProvider with dark theme and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Memory card matching game component with 4x4 grid, flip animations, move counter, matched pairs tracking, and backend score recording on game completion.
frontend/src/components/games/NumberGues: Number guessing game component (1-100) that tracks guess history with feedback (too high/low/correct), displays attempts and score, and records results to backend on successful completion.
Snake game component using canvas rendering with arrow key controls, displays current score, and records game results to backend when the game ends.
frontend/src/components/games/TicTacToeG: Tic-tac-toe game component with 3x3 grid, alternating X/O players, win/draw detection, and backend score recording on game completion.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying brand info, social media links (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, GitHub), contact email, and copyright with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Main layout wrapper component that combines Navigation header, main content area, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Responsive navigation bar with logo, route links (Home, Games, Friends, Leaderboard, Profile), authentication state handling, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Modal dialog for editing user profile (username and avatar URL) with placeholder functionality noting that backend profile updates are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, managing identity state through AuthClient and exposing authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemoryGame.ts: Implements memory card matching game logic with card flipping, match detection, move tracking, and score calculation based on number of moves.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberGuessing.ts: Manages number guessing game state where players guess a random number 1-100, tracking attempts and providing feedback (too high/low/correct) with score based on attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profile, leaderboards, friends management, and game result recording with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSnakeGame.ts: Implements classic Snake game logic with keyboard controls, collision detection, food generation, canvas rendering, and score tracking based on food eaten.
frontend/src/hooks/useTicTacToe.ts: Manages Tic-Tac-Toe game state with board management, turn switching, winner detection using predefined winning combinations, and draw detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom neon-themed color variables (cyan and purple), imports Orbitron and Rajdhani fonts, and sets up dark mode styling for a gaming aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Displays user's friend list with profiles from leaderboard data, allows adding friends by Principal ID, and provides a copyable user ID for sharing.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of available games (Snake, Tic Tac Toe, Memory Cards, Number Guessing) with descriptions, icons, and play buttons linking to each game route.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards highlighting multiplayer and leaderboards, game previews, and top 5 leaderboard display.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays global and friends-only leaderboards in tabs, showing ranked players with avatars, scores, games played, and highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity authentication and auto-registers new users with default username/avatar, redirecting to home after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows user profile with avatar, username, Principal ID, total score, games played, and an edit profile button that opens a modal.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining a dark gaming theme with neon blue/purple colors, custom fonts (Rajdhani, Orbitron), neon glow shadows, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing 'Arcade Arena', a complete online gaming website with dark gaming theme, four mini-games (Snake, Tic Tac Toe, Memory, Number Guessing), Internet Identity authentication, social features, leaderboards, and user profiles built with HTML5/CSS3/JavaScript.
